short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your online purchases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that compiles a history of your online purchases. 

Inventory automatically records purchases made on Amazon.com (more sites to be added in future versions), while purchases from other sites can currently be entered manually.

Have a historical record of your purchases at you fingertips and organize your spending!

Disclaimer: beta version, so features are incomplete and bugs may be present
